9 //macro for the destructor and the attributes
10 #define KSCOMMANDMEMBERSIMPLEBUILDERSOURCE( xBUILDERNAME )\
11  \
12  template< >\
13  KSCommandMember ## xBUILDERNAME ## Builder::~KComplexElement()\
14  {\
15  }\
16  \
17  STATICINT sKSCommand ## xBUILDERNAME ## Structure =\
18  KSCommandMember ## xBUILDERNAME ## Builder::Attribute< string >( "name" ) +\
19  KSCommandMember ## xBUILDERNAME ## Builder::Attribute< string >( "parent" ) +\
20  KSCommandMember ## xBUILDERNAME ## Builder::Attribute< string >( "child" );\
21
